short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight the visa-sponsored Dutch companies on LinkedIn and Indeed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dutch KM Sponsorship Highlighter (LinkedIn & Indeed)
*Latest data update: Nov 25, 2024
*Sometimes LinkedIn changes the className, so try re-install or send me message if it doesn't work! 

This Chrome plugin is designed to highlight companies on LinkedIn that are on the visa-sponsoring list in Dutch government. Since I didn't find useful extension that highlights the DUTCH companies (mainly for H1B or UK visa :/ So I decided to build one for myself! Leave the comment if there is any bugs or it also helps you.

To highlight content on other webpages, download the source code and add them to Chrome's developer mode in the extensions page (chrome://extensions/) and modify the company data, URL, and class name properties.

Repo source code: 
https://github.com/wentungwen/dutch_sponsorship_companies_highlighter

My LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/wentungwen/
